/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car traveling on the highway, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is divided by a concrete barrier, ensuring the safety of the travelers. In the distance, a few cars can be seen, indicating the flow of traffic. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the journey.
